      • listProducts

        void listProducts​(int branchID)
           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                  java.util.NoSuchElementException
        List all the products in specified branch.
        Parameters:
        branchID - ID of the branch. This branches products will be listed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the customer is not logged in.
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the branch doesn't exist.

      • buyOnline

        void buyOnline​(int branchID,
               int productID,
               int amount)
        Buy the specified product from specified branch.
        Parameters:
        branchID - ID of the branch
        productID - ID of the product
        amount - Amount of the product
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If the branch or the product doesn't exist.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the user is not logged in.
